start: ^Hey there... this is my first time stopping by, what do you recommend?
^I really love an iced latte! Since it's your first time it's on the house.

c-1: ^I don't know if I can do that haha... how about a latte instead?
g-0: ^It's decorated so cute in here! The city needed a slay new spot like this.
^I'm so glad you like it! I wanted to make this cafe as cozy and cute as possible.
^I tried to make it look nice.

c-2: ^You've definitely succeeded! I'll have to bring some of my friends by soon to check this place out.
c-3: ^You've done a great job with it!

g-1: ^I'm Jessica, by the way. Jessica Star. What's your name?
^It's Georgie! Nice to meet you! I'm new to the city so it makes me happy to get to meet cool customers like yourself.

c-4: ^Aww, thanks babe! Welcome to the city-- I know it's intimidating moving here but you'll find your people in no time.

g-2: ^Did you have a cafe back where you're from?
^I didn't-- this is my first shop! I worked at a cafe run by my aunt back home and I wanna make her proud.

c-6: ^You seem to really have your life together... opening a cafe in a new town by yourself? That's so swag.
c-7: ^That's so exciting, I hope it continues to do well.

g-3: ^Thanks so much-- this coffee looks delicious. And the latte art? So cute.
^I'm glad you like it! My latte art is a bit rusty... I'm trying to get making a rosetta design down.

c-8: ^I don't know how baristas do it, it's so cool you get to make coffee and art!
